sentence: 2693, District of Columbia       Electronic Transmittal of Legislation Act.
2693, District of Columbia       Electronic Transmittal of Legislation Act.
2693, District of Columbia       Electronic Transmittal of Legislation Act.
2693, District of Columbia       Electronic Transmittal of Legislation Act.
2693, District of Columbia Electronic Transmittal of       Legislation Act.
2693,       the District of Columbia Electronic Transmittal Act, I write       in strong opposition to these bills.

Speaker, today, I introduce the District of Columbia  Electronic Transmittal of Legislation Act, which would permit the Chair  of the Council of the District of Columbia to transmit legislation to  Congress in the form of the Chair's choosing, including electronic  form.
